{{Expansion}}
'''Zane David Weiner''' ([[11 March|March 11]], [[1963]]) served as a unit production manager for [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]] and was a producer for [[The Hobbit (film series)|''The Hobbit'' (film series)]].

==Roles==
* '''[[2013]]''': ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]'' - One of the "[[Laketown Spies]]"

==Awards==
* [[2004]] - '''[http://www.producersguild.org/ PGA Award]''', Outstanding Directorial Achievement in Motion Pictures, ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]''         
* [[2014]] - '''[http://www.empireonline.com/ Empire Award]''', Best Sci-Fi/Fantasy, ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]''
* [[2014]] - ''' [http://heartlandfilm.org/festival/ Heartland Film Festival]''', Truly Moving Picture Award, ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]''
* 2014 - ''' [http://www.producersguild.org/ PGA Awards]''', Vanguard Award, [[The Hobbit (film series)|''The Hobbit'' (film series)]]
